resources.string: The best app for your fitness journey
Do you want to make a difference?
Walk forward and push your toe into the ground, lift your heel off the ground each step and tense your muscle repeat on each leg and walk forward slowly
Point your toes into the ground. Slowly walk forward and backwards and keep your in the air as long as possible
Balance on the balls of your feet, lower the heels of your feet towards the ground and pause, then push through the balls of your feet
stand with your feet at shoulder-width apart. Flex your knees and hips and sit back into the squat while lowering your body
step forward with one leg,Lower your body until your knee nearly touches the ground.Push off the floor with your front foot until you return to the starting position and switch legs.
Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.Start by doing a regular squat, then jump up. When you land, lower your body back into the squat position.
Lay flat on your back with your knees bent and your feet flat on the ground. Raise your head and shoulders off the floor. Return to starting position and repeat.
Lay on your back. Keep your legs together and as straight as possible.Slowly raise your legs as high as you can, pause at this position, and then slowly lower your legs back down.
Place forearms on the ground with your elbows bent at a 90Â° angle. Lift your belly off the floor and form a straight line from your heels to the crown of your head and hold
Hold your body with arms locked above the equipment. Lower your body slowly while leaning forward.Raise your body above the bars until your arms are locked.
Place your hands directly under shoulders,Flatten your back so your entire body is straight and slowly lower your body. Exhale as you push back to the starting position.
Put your hands slightly wider than shoulder-width.Slowly lower your body until your chest almost touches the ground.Raise your body until you almost lock your elbows.
Lower your head towards the floor by bending your elbows. Push through your hands and return to the starting pike position. Repeat
Slowly lower your body while keeping your elbows locked. Slowly raise your body back to the start position.
Grip the edge of the bench with your hands, Keep your feet together and legs straight.Lower your body straight down.Slowly press back up to the starting point.
